verses.verse: The <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> shall have <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2506>part<s%> nor <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> with <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the offerings of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> made by fire, and his <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

Therefore shall they have <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> their <S%H251>brothers:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is their <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> as he has <S%H1696>said<s%> to them.

And <S%H2088>this<s%> shall be the <S%H3548>priest's<s%> <S%H4941>due<s%> from the <S%H5971>people,<s%> from them that <S%H2076>offer<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice,<s%> <S%H518>whether<s%> it be <S%H7794>ox<s%> or <S%H7716>sheep;<s%> and they shall <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest<s%> the <S%H2220>shoulder,<s%> and the two <S%H3895>cheeks,<s%> and the <S%H6896>maw.<s%>

The first <S%H7225>fruit<s%> also of your <S%H1715>corn,<s%> of your <S%H8492>wine,<s%> and of your <S%H3323>oil,<s%> and the <S%H7225>first<s%> of the <S%H1488>fleece<s%> of your <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> shall you <S%H5414>give<s%> him.

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H977>chosen<s%> him out of <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> him and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> for <S%H3605>ever.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H3881>Levite<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H259>any<s%> of your <S%H8179>gates<s%> out of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> he <S%H1481>sojourned,<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H183>desire<s%> of his <S%H5315>mind<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H977>choose;<s%>

Then he shall <S%H8334>minister<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> his <S%H430>God,<s%> as <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> do, which <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
They shall have like <S%H2506>portions<s%> to <S%H398>eat,<s%> <S%H905>beside<s%> that which comes of the <S%H4465>sale<s%> of his <S%H5921>patrimony.<s%> <S%H1><s%>

<S%H3588>When<s%> you are <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you, you shall not <S%H3925>learn<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> after the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> of <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

There shall not be <S%H4672>found<s%> among you any one that makes his <S%H1121>son<s%> or his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H784>fire,<s%> or that uses <S%H7081>divination,<s%> or an <S%H6049>observer<s%> of times, or an <S%H5172>enchanter,<s%> or a <S%H3784>witch.<s%>
Or a <S%H2266>charmer,<s%> <S%H2267><s%> or a <S%H7592>consulter<s%> with familiar <S%H178>spirits,<s%> or a <S%H3049>wizard,<s%> or a <S%H1875>necromancer.<s%> <S%H4191><s%>

For <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things are an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and <S%H1558>because<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> does <S%H3423>drive<s%> them out from <S%H6440>before<s%> you.
You shall be <S%H8549>perfect<s%> with the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

For <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H3423>possess,<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to <S%H6049>observers<s%> of times, and to <S%H7080>diviners:<s%> but as for you, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has not <S%H5414>suffered<s%> you <S%H3651>so<s%> to do.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H6965>raise<s%> up to you a <S%H5030>Prophet<s%> from the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of you, of your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> to me; to him you shall <S%H8085>listen;<s%>

According to <S%H3605>all<s%> that you <S%H7592>desired<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H2722>Horeb<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Let me not <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> let me <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> any <S%H5750>more,<s%> that I <S%H4191>die<s%> not.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, They have <S%H3190>well<s%> spoken that <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

I will <S%H6965>raise<s%> them up a <S%H5030>Prophet<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> their <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> to you, and will <S%H5414>put<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> in his <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> and he shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to them <S%H3605>all<s%> that I shall <S%H6680>command<s%> him.

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that <S%H376>whoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to my <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> in my <S%H8034>name,<s%> I will <S%H1875>require<s%> it of him.

But the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> shall <S%H2102>presume<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> in my <S%H8034>name,<s%> which I have not <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him to <S%H1696>speak,<s%> or that shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> even that <S%H5030>prophet<s%> shall <S%H4191>die.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> you <S%H559>say<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> <S%H349>How<s%> shall we <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has not <S%H1696>spoken?<s%>

<S%H834>When<s%> a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H1696>speaks<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> if the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H1961>follow<s%> not, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to pass, that is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has not <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> but the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it <S%H2087>presumptuously:<s%> you shall not be <S%H1481>afraid<s%> of him.
